data.title: Aide aux cinémas du monde
data.meta_description: Created in 2012 and co-managed by the CNC and the Institut français, the Aide aux cinémas du monde (ACM) aims to encourage and support the international coproduction of feature films between France...
data.text:
Next Commissions

The dates are subject to change.

PRE-FILMING SUPPORT (1st & 2nd committees)

2023 - SESSION 04

Call : From November 27 to December 1st, 2023

Reading Committee : March 11 & 13, 2024

Plenary Committee : April 24 & 29 , 2024

2024 - SESSION 01

Applications: 26th February to March 1st, 2024

Reading session: June 13 and 19, 2024

Plenary session: July 18 and 24, 2024

2024 - SESSION 02

Applications: From June 3rd to June 7th, 2024

Reading session: 12th and 19th September 2024

Plenary session: 30-31st October ; 6th – 7th November 2024

2024 - SESSION 03

Applications: From September 2nd to 6th, 2024

Reading session: December 2024 (Dates TBC)

Plenary session: January 2025 (Dates TBC)

2024 - SESSION 04

Applications: From November 25th to 29th, 2024

Reading session: February or March 2025 (Dates TBC)

Plenary session: March or April 2025 (Dates TBC)

2024 - SESSION 02

Applications: From April 29th to May 3rd 2024

Plenary session: July, 12th 2024

2024 - SESSION 03

Applications: From September 9th to 13th 2024

Plenary session: November 2024 (Date TBC)

2024 - SESSION 04

Applications: From November 12th to 15th 2024

Plenary session: January 2025 (Date TBC)

2025 - SESSION 01
